Counter-Strike will remain the best team shooter for me. No game has ever been as catchy as the good old 1.6. Maybe the game doesn't have amazing graphics, maybe the terrible monotony sometimes gets boring, but I want to return to the game! This is a fact. Play, don't forget and the game won't die!
